name: (SPARQL module) Wikidata: Get list of biblical characters
description:
SPARQL module is work in progress. If reliant on paging stay with Generic module. 

This preset gets a list of biblical characters, along with the sections in which they occur, from WikiData. Add an arbitrary seed node and fetch data.

See https://www.wikidata.org/wiki/Wikidata:Lists/List_of_biblical_characters

You can try out different query on https://query.wikidata.org/ (paste the value of the query parameter to get started).


Please be aware that expressions in angle brackets are handled as placeholder by Facepager. Thus, if your query contains angle brackets, escape them with a backslash. Pagination is handled by the <offset> placeholder.
